question: Im 26weeks pregnant and i can feel my baby move but my lower back is in so much pain and my right leg is cramping really bad. I have diabetes and already listed as high risk due to last baby being born 2weeks early. I have a lot of pelvic pressure and a really soft cervix. Any idea?
title: what do you think it could be?
